name: Brad Kaiser
Para1: Hello! I'm Brad and i'm currently working on exploring the world of FRONT END DEVELOPMENT! I also figured I needed a website, so here it is! I am interested in new technology, AI, ML, Big Data, Videogames, Game Theory, Efficiency, and innovation.
Para2: I am just a guy whos looking for a job that fulfills most, if not all, of the following criteria:
